definition: to gather/to collect/collected works/classifier for sections of a TV series etc: episode
100 ml/one-tenth of a peck/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗
to close/to join/to fit/to be equal to/whole/together/round (in battle)/conjunction (astronomy)/1st note of pentatonic scale/old variant of 盒[he2]

sentences.english: We're basically a set of equilibria in a big membrane.
sentences.chinese: 我们本质上就是一系列膜的平衡的集合体。

sentences.english: Potential sources are the aggregates of probable epicenters in the future.
sentences.chinese: 潜在震源区是未来可能的震中集合体。

sentences.english: Additionally, a software service may itself be an aggregate of other software services.
sentences.chinese: 另外，一项软件服务本身就是其它软件服务的集合体。

sentences.english: Understanding the interactions required of a framework aids in the development of new ensembles.
sentences.chinese: 了解框架必需的交互有助于开发新的集合体。

sentences.english: We are becoming a planet of racial and cultural hybrids.
sentences.chinese: 我们的星球正变成一个各种族和文化的集合体。

sentences.english: Natural talc is a multimineral aggregate.
sentences.chinese: 天然滑石矿是多种矿物的集合体。

sentences.english: The aggregation is a count of members.
sentences.chinese: 多晶硅是细小硅晶的集合体。

sentences.english: Ownership has been described as "the entirety of powers of use and disposal allowed by law".
sentences.chinese: 所有权被称作是䏰“法定使用权和处置权的集合体。”

sentences.english: But you can think about the human brain as a collection of specialized tools.
sentences.chinese: 但我们认为人脑才是所有特殊的工具的集合体。

sentences.english: An aggregation of fragments is the only kind of whole we now have.
sentences.chinese: 这种碎片的集合体是我们现有的唯一完整无缺的方式。

sentences.english: Modern metropolitans is the very hugeness aggregate of the isolated buildings.
sentences.chinese: 现代大城市正是聚集了这种孤立建筑物的庞大集合体。

sentences.english: A submicroscopic aggregate of organic and inorganic molecules in colloidal solution.
sentences.chinese: 有机分子和无机分子在胶体溶液中的亚微观集合体。

sentences.english: The form of secondary minerals is schistose aggregated and spherical.
sentences.chinese: 次生矿物形态主要呈片状集合体和球状体。

sentences.english: This writing will deal only with the welting of single fiber elements and not fiber assemblies.
sentences.chinese: 这章论述内容只限于单纤维，而不涉及纤维集合体。

sentences.english: The operetta is a pastiche of 18th century style.
sentences.chinese: 轻喜剧是18世纪风格的集合体。

definition: cubical system (crystallography)/crystal system based on cubic lattice/equiaxial crystal system
to come together (to form sth)/to assemble together/(chemistry) to polymerize
lit. one body two sides (idiom)/fig. a situation with two sides to it
mix together/put together (usu. things that do not blend well together)
